Headline: Work Progress Administration Art
Article_Body: Photographic Print from New York production of "Macbeth." Federal Theater Project production of "Macbeth." Federal Art Project WPA poster advertising an exhibition. "Spirochete" presented by the Federal Theater Division of WPA   Technician Carter Baughman at the sights of the new twelve-inch Zeiss refracting telescope at Griffith Observatory, Los Angeles (1935) Construction of Griffith Observatory, planetarium, Los Angeles, 1934.  "Untitled, 1954" (L) and "Untitled, 1949" by Mark Rothko, Royal Academy of Arts, London (2016) American artist Allen Saalburg directs WPA artists at work in a temporary studio at the American Museum of Natural History on murals commissioned for the Arsenal Building in Central Park, New York (1935)
